# HashSetUtility.AsReadOnly&lt;T&gt; method

Returns a read-only wrapper around *set*.

```csharp
public static ReadOnlyHashSet<T> AsReadOnly<T>(this HashSet<T> set)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | The type of object in the set. |
| set | The HashSet to wrap. |

## Return Value

A new [`ReadOnlyHashSet`](../ReadOnlyHashSet-1.md) that wraps *set*.
